data.description: Our world is transforming, and PTC is leading the way. Our software brings the physical and digital worlds together, enabling companies to improve operations, create better products, and empower people in all aspects of their business. Our people make all the difference in our success. Today, we are a global team of nearly 7,000 and our main objective is to create opportunities for our team members to explore, learn, and grow – all while seeing their ideas come to life and celebrating the differences that make us who we are and the work we do possible.  About the RoleWe are seeking a highly motivated AI Research & Development Intern to join our team in San Ramon, CA. This internship is focused on hands-on exploration and development of AI-driven technologies, including AI models and AI agent or framework development.This role is ideal for a student who is excited about applied AI, enjoys working on open-ended technical problems, and wants exposure to real-world AI R&D in an enterprise environment. The intern will collaborate closely with experienced engineers and product leaders on exploratory AI projects that may influence future product capabilities.What You’ll Work OnDepending on interests and project needs, responsibilities may include:Assisting with research, prototyping, and development of AI models, including experimentation with large language models (LLMs) or other ML techniquesExploring and contributing to AI agent frameworks, workflows, or orchestration patternsImplementing proof-of-concept solutions to demonstrate AI-driven capabilitiesEvaluating emerging AI technologies, tools, and frameworksWriting clean, well-documented code and technical notes to support knowledge sharingCollaborating with cross-functional teams to understand real-world use cases and constraintsThis is a learning-focused role with meaningful technical ownership, not just observation.What We’re Looking ForRequired / Preferred Qualifications:Currently pursuing a Bachelor’s, Master’s, or PhD in Computer Science, Engineering, Data Science, AI/ML, or a related fieldStrong interest in Artificial Intelligence and Machine LearningSome experience with Python is highly desired; familiarity with JavaScript, Java, or similar languages is a plusExposure to machine learning concepts, AI models, or AI frameworks Curiosity, initiative, and comfort working in an environment with evolving requirementsAbility to think critically, experiment, and learn quicklyNice to Have (Not Required):Experience with LLMs, Fine-Tuning Models, AI agents, or prompt engineeringFamiliarity with ML libraries or frameworks (e.g., LangChain, PyTorch, TensorFlow, etc.)Interest in enterprise software, systems, or applied AI use casesWhat You’ll GainHands-on experience working on real AI R&D initiativesExposure to how AI is explored, prototyped, and evaluated in a production-oriented organizationMentorship from senior engineers and product leadersA chance to contribute ideas that may shape future AI capabilitiesLocation & Work ModelThis role is based in San Ramon, California. A hybrid or onsite presence will be required to maximize collaboration and learning.PTC carefully considers a wide variety of factors when determining compensation. The anticipated average hourly rate for this position is $32/hour.  This rate reflects a good-faith estimate of compensation at the time of posting. Actual compensation may vary based on a candidate's major, degree currently being pursued and location. At PTC, we believe in the power of diverse ideas and perspectives. As a global company that values and respects all identities, cultures, and perspectives, we strive to create an inclusive PTC for ALL through an environment where everyone feels like they belong and are empowered to bring their true, authentic selves to work.
